verses.name: 1 Kings 18:18
verses.text: And he answered, I have not troubled Israel; but thou, and thy father’s house, in that ye have forsaken the commandments of the Lord, and thou hast followed Baalim.

verses.name: 1 Kings 18:19
verses.text: Now therefore send, and gather to me all Israel unto mount Carmel, and the prophets of Baal four hundred and fifty, and the prophets of the groves four hundred, which eat at Jezebel’s table.

verses.name: 1 Kings 18:20
verses.text: So Ahab sent unto all the children of Israel, and gathered the prophets together unto mount Carmel.
